title.rendered: “Decisive IDF Strikes: Targeting Hezbollah Terror Cells and Weapon Storehouses in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Elimination of terrorists and attacks on terror targets; the IDF attacked two terrorist cells operating in Hezbollah military buildings, alongside a weapons storehouse, terror infrastructures and additional military buildings.

Yesterday (Sunday), an IDF force from Unit 869 identified a terrorist cell operating in a military building belonging to the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the Yaroun area of southern Lebanon.
In a rapid intelligence response, air force fighter jets attacked the military building where the terrorists were located.
In addition, an air force aircraft attacked a terrorist cell of the organization, which was identified by a Golan reconnaissance unit operating in the Hula area.

During the night, combat aircraft and aircraft of the air force attacked additional targets of the Hezbollah terror organization in southern Lebanon.
Among the targets attacked were a weapons storehouse and a Hezbollah military building in the Mis al-Jabal area, alongside terror infrastructures in the Al-Khiyam area, and additional military buildings in the Hula area.

An attached documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/3UVX9cP
